title: BitFlyer Adds 5 Altcoins to Its Trading Platforms in Europe and the US
text:
BitFlyer Adds 5 Altcoins to Its Trading Platforms in Europe and the US

Cryptocurrency News 2 hours ago (Sep 24, 2019 09:41PM ET)

BitFlyer Adds 5 Altcoins to Its Trading Platforms in Europe and the US BitFlyer, a Tokyo-based cryptocurrency exchange, is adding 5 new altcoins to its platforms in Europe and the United States. On Sept. 23, cryptocurrency exchange bitFlyer announced that it is adding five new altcoins in Europe: (BCH), (ETC), (LTC), Lisk (LSK) and Monacoin (MONA), which will be available immediately to its European customers, while bitFlyer U.S. customers will have immediate access to three of these coins: BCH, ETC, and LTC. Continue Reading on Coin Telegraph
